column2: §Y$TARGET$§ is oppressing our brethren. We need to liberate them and bring them under our protection!
All realm characters with your culture won't accept your failure! (§R-15§W opinion of you)\n
Might makes right! We don't need reasons to take land.

The previous king has died, leaving the throne without a strong successor. His great conquests are now ruled by the generals whom are all eager to take power. We should attack them before they attack us.
The line of the Macedonian Kings has been overthrown, their land being ruled by us and the descendants of the Macedonian generals. We should take their land to establish a new empire ruled by us!
[From.GetTitledName] must only be one tier lower than [Root.GetTitledName].\n
The realm size of [From.GetTitledName] is at least 95-(Martial difference between [Root.GetTitledName] and [From.GetTitledName]) * 5.\n
Our country is a strong and powerful one. Our martial prowess will easily defeat $TARGET$ even though they might outnumber us. This is our time to win spear-won land!
Our enemy holds lands that would belong to one of our vassals. I will invade it on his behalf.
All vassals of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName] submit to [Root.GetFirstName]'s vassal\n
